name: Fed by Grace Food Pantry
description: An outreach ministry of Grace Fellowship Church offering food-related assistance to families in Laurel County. The food pantry offers food to Laurel County residents in need and is stocked by church members and outside donations. Provides free food assistance to families and individuals facing food insecurity.
source: Verified from official website and multiple sources
eligibility_requirements: Laurel County residents in need of food assistance
populations_served: Laurel County residents, families and individuals facing food insecurity
notes: VERIFIED INFORMATION: All contact information verified on 2024-01-15. CITATIONS: Contact information verified from official website https://www.graceforyou.com/inreach-amp-outreach. Phone number (606) 864-4884 confirmed current and matches Google search results. Address 502 Barbourville Rd, London, KY 40744 verified from Google Maps and multiple online sources. Hours of operation (Tuesdays 11 AM - 1 PM) verified from church website and multiple sources. Organization is an outreach ministry of Grace Fellowship Church. Church phone number (606) 864-4635 also available. Food pantry is stocked by church members and outside donations. All information cross-referenced with Google search results for consistency.
